name: XP8
overview: XP8 is a vertically scrolling shoot-'em-up featuring raytraced graphics with many reflections. Eight different weapons are on offer, which can be powered up to several stages, and are collected from tokens, sometimes in hidden sections. A simultaneous two-player mode is offered, which makes getting through the five levels (with passwords for each one) a little easier. The introduction takes the form of a few static screens.
